abstract.t: The Server Index Query (SIQ) protocol is intended to provide a standard means by which a mail exchange (MX) server can query one or more external services for scoring based on facts or reputation of an IP/domain pair. This document specifies the communication protocol used to transmit the IP/domain query and return the query response. The implementation, correctness of results, and/or management of SIQ servers is beyond the scope of this document.
